text: Countdown to Amenti The electrical spiral serves to transmit electrical energy from the Meta-galac- tic Core, into the anti-particle universe, through the morphogenetic fields, then into dimensions 1-7 of the particle universe. These are the energy mechanics through which the universe is perpetually sustained. The Zetas are aware of these energy mechanics, which gives them a tremendous technolog- ical advantage over present-day human technological capability. The energy mechanics of the Merkaba Fields holographically creates the perceptual/experiential illusions of matter, space and time through the refraction of energy particles. The reality behind this illusion is an eternal Uniﬁed Field of energy within which every- thing resides, and out of which all things are composed. The following example will give you some idea of how that holographic projection tricks human per- ceptions into the experience of space, time and matter. Agartha The civilizations of Agartha, the Inner Earth, which exist in a frequency modulation zone between Earth and its parallel-universe double, between D-3 and D-4 time bands, actually exist at the core of Earth’s Sun, within the 3.5- dimensional frequency level.
